initial_comment.comment: to continue on my previous post on the sdk ... I'm past the npm installs.  Now this error shows up when I run `make sdk-node-unit-tests`

text: happens on both Windows7 and osX vagrant
also, I started from a Gerrit clone, commit 0716064
I killed my Gerrit clone and cloned from GitHub instead, commit 346f9fb
`make node-sdk-unit-tests` works out of the box on osX vagrant
in win7 vagrant,  I had to add `sudo npm install -g node node-pre-gyp && npm install --no-bin-links` to the hyperledger/fabric/sdk/node/makefile and then `make node-sdk-unit-tests` works
so, at the very least, something didn't make it across the github to Gerrit migration ?
interesting, we should sanity check it
node-sdk-unit tests are failing on gerrit clone.. Observed that lib folder is not copied in sdk/node folder
